Mobster fired again at Razorclaw...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 4:=
01 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


  Razor Claw raised to his feat to s=
tubborn to know when to quit. he stepped forward, ready for anything the la=
rger bot had to offer. "You ready to surrender yet?" He asked sarcastically=
 even though he already knew the answer.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: SOULSTICE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, December=
 24, 2000 9:34 PM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Mobster watched, w=
ondering how Razorclaw felt...and enjoying the thought. Mobster, as cruel a=
s the Mini-Mafia could be, waited for Razorclaw to regain his strength and =
composure, he wanted to knock it out of Razorclaw again...
      ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
     Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 3:16 AM
      Subject: Re: Sorry souls=
tice


      Razor Claw bounced off Mobster, the impact made his head spin.=
 The mighty raptor heard Mobster have some smart ass comment toward him. He=
 looked up in time to see Mobster raise his weapon again. Razor Claw turned=
 and tried to run and got just far enough to avoid being hit directly by th=
e beam. The weapon still had a devastating effect on him though as the shra=
pnel of dirt and pebbles shred at his skin. The blast shot him about sixty =
yards from where he'd started. He landed with an ooof as his body skipped m=
ultiple times across the hard African ground. There he lay in pain, trying =
to regain his strength and composure.
        ----- Original Message ----- =

        From: SOULSTICE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sun=
day, December 24, 2000 1:53 PM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


     =
   Mobster wobbled some, but that was the extent of it. He turned around.

=
        Mobster (Grenade voice): Are you trying to knock me over, little ma=
n?

        Mobster fires at Razorclaw once...
          ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
         Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
          Subject: Re: Sor=
ry soulstice


          A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw as Mobsters foo=
t raised above him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. His energy was =
low so he didn't want to risk his shield not holding. He ran toward Mobster=
. Mobsters foot struck the ground behind Razor Claw, the impact shook the g=
round sending Razor claw rolling past the giant gestalt. He rolled to his f=
eat and turned again ready for battle. He dove forward at Mobsters rear end=
 hoping the giant would still be off balance enough to knock over.
        =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: SOULSTICE 
            =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 10:46 A=
M
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


            (I normally am aga=
inst stomping, but...)
             
            Mobster raised his foot.

=
            Mobster (Kracken voice): Over!

            Mobster brung his f=
oot down towards Razorclaw...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
             From: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
        Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:11 PM
              Subject: Re:=
 Sorry soulstice


              Razor Claw remained still as a statue, wat=
ching the battle rage around him. He opened a comm to anyone listening. "Ra=
zor Claw to any available maximal, I'm pinned down and need some coverfire.=
"
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: SOULS=
TICE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturda=
y, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
                Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice

=

                Mobster stood still. The raptor would have to move sometim=
e.

                Mobster (Horn Drill voice): He'll have to move sometime=
. Who helped to build this house?

                Mobster kept his cannon =
aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
                  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
                  From: CYBERWOLF4 
                  To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:=
48 PM
                  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                  Ra=
zor Claw knew that there was only one way to survive a blast from a weapon =
of that size. he transformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on his s=
hield. The ground around him incinerated on contact. He survived but it was=
 sapping to much of his strength. The raptor couldn't move without deactiva=
ting his shield.
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
            From: SOULSTICE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
                  Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
                =
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                    Mobster took a scrat=
ch of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant cann=
on at Razorclaw and fired...
                      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
                      From: CYBERWOLF4 
                      To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01=
 AM
                      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                  =
    Razor Claw stood confused for the moment, he tried to show no weakness.=
 He stepped forward and hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to i=
mpress me?" he asked looking up at the bot he challenged. 
                =
        ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: SOULSTI=
CE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                       =
 Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
                        Subject=
: Re: Sorry soulstice


                        Gigas didn't move an inch, =
seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

                        Gigas:=
 How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work=
 2 ways.

                        Mobster switches voices.

               =
         Kracken: But right now, we're Mobster...
                         =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                          From: CYBERWOLF4 
=
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                         =
 Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
                          Subje=
ct: Re: Sorry soulstice


                          Razor Claw looked up at=
 his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's m=
ake this interesting, you knock me down, I join your alliance, I knock you =
down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled his =
left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
  =
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
                   =
         From: SOULSTICE 
                            To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
                            Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
=
                            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                =
            Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my b=
est shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, I am =
not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt of th=
e attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you sho=
uld join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

                  =
          Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
         =
                     ----- Original Message ----- 
                        =
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
                              To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
                              Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 A=
M
                              Subject: Sorry soulstice


                =
              Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

=
                              claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Behol=
der 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps=
 in the air and backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Ma=
fia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw f=
igure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charg=
e) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

                              Ra=
zor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell bu=
t Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked=
 back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the atta=
cker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'=
d hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
                      =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
                                Fro=
m: THECODE 
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
                         Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
         =
                       Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe t=
he three should get help.


                                OOC: Hey, Gigas=
 punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
                                -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
=
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                   =
             Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                    =
            Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should=
 get help.


                                Razor Claw saw the three bots =
leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance memb=
ers. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chase=
d the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to =
robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you wil=
l be forced to, your choice."

                                He aproached=
 the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peac=
efully.
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
                           From: dachande 
                                =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Monday, Decem=
ber 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                                Subject: Eclipse, Wolv=
eritron, and Ramus


                                ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/=
Ramus::
                                 
                                 =
   They had heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part=
 in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leavi=
ng, and togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.
=


























          eGroups Sponsor
